W. E. WILLIAMSON, CLERK
Hay 12, 1967
Hr. L. F. P. Curry
Curry Steel Products Company
Post Office Box 443
Independence, Hissouri 64051
Dear Hr. Curry:
Thank you for taking the time to write to me in re¬
gard to H. R. 6736 and S. 1160, Public Television Act of
1967.
I am glad to have the benefit of your views on this
very important legislative proposal and you may be assured
they will receive the Committee's most careful consideration
at such time as hearings are held on these bills. There has
been no date set as yet for the commencing of the hearings on
Public TV, but I have listed you to be notified at such time
as a date is announced and the notice will carry with it an
invitation to appear as a witness if you so desire or send
a statement of your views in a letter.
Sincerely
HOS/d
